revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Dark Cave |image = [[File:Dark Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Dark Cave. |tokens = 6,500 |location = Between Route 45 and 46, south of Blackthorn City. }} '''Dark Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 127,000 |- | Dunsparce (Boss) || 400,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Geodude * Golbat * Graveler * Wobuffet * Dunsparce (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
